compatibility.notes: The GPL-1.0-only license has a strong copyleft effect, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under GPL-1.0-only or a compatible license. This applies to both static and dynamic linking.

key_requirements: You must provide the same freedoms to recipients that you received.
You must make the source code available to recipients.
You must inform recipients of their rights under the GPL.
license.name: GPL-1.0-only
obligations: Distribute copies of the source code when distributing the software.
Include a copy of the GPL license with any distributed software.
Include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
State any changes made to the original software when distributing modified versions.
Distribute modified versions under the same GPL license.
